text: in the seconds after the shooting
an eyewitness is pushed back as he
desperately calls for medical help just
meters away a man in his 20s is lying on
the ground having been shot by Ferguson
police
this was part of the build-up to what
happened an exchange of gunfire between
two rival gangs a short while before
there'd been reports of looting when
police arrived there was a standoff they
claimed they were hit by bricks and
bottles
police say the man they shot had been
involved in the earlier disorder he'd
fired at this unmarked police car he was
then chased and targeted officers again
he engaged the officers at the time
there were four officers who were in
that van all four fired the suspect and
the suspect fell their suspect is in a
local hospital he is in critical
unstable condition in surgery earlier
hundreds of protesters in Ferguson
marked the first anniversary of the
death of Michael Brown the shooting of
the black teenager who was unarmed
sparked demonstrations across the United
States and led to renewed accusations
about racism in the police Michael
Brown's father says the death of his son
still hurts him every day at the end of
the day I still lost my boy
I love dated people some people are
getting justice but the way I feel this
I'm still hard week the families they're
hurting you know there have been
attempts to improve relations between
the mainly white police force in
Ferguson and the city's population which
is two-thirds black this latest shooting
will do little to resolve the tension
between them been Gagan BBC news
